metadata.description: Production-grade frontend design + dark mode mastery. 2 skills, 20 commands.

plugins.name: impeccable-dark
plugins.description: Production-grade frontend design + dark mode mastery. Combines the Impeccable frontend-design skill with a comprehensive dark-mode-design skill. 20 commands including /darken, /audit-dark, /theme-toggle, /polish, /audit, /colorize, and more.
